# interpolationMode

**Instance Property**

The mode used to determine how values for times between the keyframes are calculated.

## Declaration

```swift
var interpolationMode: SKInterpolationMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values are defined in [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKInterpolationMode]. The default value is [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKInterpolationMode/linear].

## Interpolation Modifiers

- **repeatMode**: The mode used to determine how the keyframe sequence repeats.
